name: Air Transat A330-342 [C-GKTS] Close Up Taxi and Takeoff from Montréal-Trudeau ᴴᴰ
description:
As part of its 30 year anniversary, Air Transat painted 3 of their 4 A330-300s in this unique light blue livery! One actually came to Calgary in the spring to cover for some cancelled flights to Mexico but I wasn't able to make it. Fortunately I caught it here in Montreal, departing for Toronto, taxiing up close and departing 24L! Enjoy this special Air Transat.

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Air Transat (TSC/TS)
Aircraft: Airbus A330-300 (A333)
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: "30 years"
Engines: 2x RR Trent 772-60 
Registration: C-GKTS
Route: Montréal-Trudeau (YUL) - Toronto-Pearson (YYZ)
Callsign: Transat 468 heavy/lourd
Runway used: 24L
Date filmed: July 18, 2017
Local time: 1745
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/CGKTS
